# Repository About Section Information

Use this information to update your GitHub repository's About section:

## Description
```
A modern Flutter app combining financial tracking with AI-powered insights. Features real-time Financial Stress Index, expense tracking, analytics, and personalized AI advice using Google Gemini.
```

## Website (if applicable)
Leave blank or add your app's website URL if you have one.

## How to Update

1. Go to your repository: https://github.com/SloppyTank9892/MoneyMind
2. Click the gear icon (⚙️) next to "About" on the right sidebar
3. Enter the description above
4. Add the topics/tags listed above
5. Select your license type
6. Click "Save changes"
